scripts.destroy: rm -rf images && rm -rf static && rm -rf index.html && rm -rf asset-manifest.json && rm -rf favicon.ico
scripts.move: cp -r build/images images && cp -r build/static static && cp -r build/index.html index.html && cp -r build/asset-manifest.json asset-manifest.json && cp -r build/favicon.ico favicon.ico && rm -rf build
scripts.deploy: yarn destroy && yarn build && yarn move
